item.title: 2 problems and defently 2 solutions
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

Search for 4875 in your client until you see

teleportToX = 4875;

Just change the x and y coords. Keeo doing that until all of them are changed, I think there is two or three in there.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems and defently 2 solutions
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Ok im having some trouble with my sever im trying to chnage the colour of the emote teleport command’s in the little emote list table i search for public void update()
and

[code] public void update()
{
handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);

sendFrame126("@whi@Home", 180);

sendFrame126("@whi@Marc Pk Scape", 2458);
flushOutStream();/[code]
Ok it comes up with one but…theres 12 diffrent emote teleports and it only comes up as one which is the home one i CAN edit it chnage the colour and where it sends u to but i cannot edit the rest as i cannot find them can someone please help me i would be very greatfull

2: can someone please tell me how to change where people died they spawn eg
player {Cat} dies and goes to x 4875 y 4575 cords i wanna change it so that anyone who dies goes to x 4857 y 9586 i would be very greatfull again it will help me so much[/code][/code]
